creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: purple apron with vertical balck and white stripes in center and red and black stripes on side edges; bottom has fringes with six bells (silver-like) and ten little "cow bells" attached; neck strap, but no ties; fringes are red, blue, purple, black and white
dimension: 34 5/8 x 17 7/8 in. (87.95 x 45.4 cm) (without fringe or neck strap)
title: "Daai" Cloth Shaman's Apron
